response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its significance, I propose to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects the unique qualities and potential benefits the product offers, while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and aligns with your valuation of the product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
